title: Install Dependencies - TenSEAL, Concrete ML, node-seal
description:
Install all required dependencies for real homomorphic encryption implementation:
- Backend: pip install tenseal, concrete-ml
- Frontend: npm install node-seal
- cmake for Concrete ML build

title: Testing - Verify encryption/decryption roundtrip and end-to-end pipeline
description:
Test the complete encrypted inference pipeline:
- Test encryption roundtrip: encrypt in browser → decrypt → verify pixels match
- Test backend: verify public key generation, test image encryption
- Test frontend: verify SEAL context initialization, test public key loading
- Test full pipeline: encrypt → send to server → receive → decrypt
- Verify prediction accuracy on MNIST test data

title: Deployment - Deploy to Vercel and verify production pipeline
description:
Deploy and verify the encrypted inference system:
- Deploy frontend to Vercel
- Deploy backend to Vercel
- Configure environment variables
- Test end-to-end pipeline on production
- Verify encryption works in browser environment

title: Backend Encryption Setup - Create encryption utilities, endpoints
description:
Create backend encryption infrastructure:
- Create encryption.py with HomomorphicEncryption class
- Initialize CKKS scheme for TenSEAL
- Add /encryption/keys endpoint for public key distribution
- Add /encryption/predict_encrypted endpoint
- Initialize HE system on startup

title: Backend Inference - Implement encrypted CNN prediction
description:
Implement backend encrypted inference:
- Implement CNN operations on ciphertext using TenSEAL
- Handle encrypted image data from frontend
- Run inference on encrypted data
- Return encrypted prediction result
- Test with both TenSEAL CKKS scheme

title: Frontend Decryption - Decrypt server response and extract prediction
description:
Implement frontend decryption:
- Decrypt result using node-seal private key
- Extract prediction from decrypted logits
- Update classifyWithHE() to use real encryption/decryption
- Remove Base64 encoding/decoding
- Update UI to show encrypted/decrypted data properly

title: Frontend Encryption Setup - Client-side encryption with node-seal
description:
Create frontend encryption infrastructure:
- Create frontend/src/utils/encryption.js with HomomorphicEncryption class
- Initialize SEAL context with same parameters as backend
- Implement fetchPublicKey() to get server public key
- Implement encryptImage() to encrypt input using node-seal
- Initialize HE system on App mount
